articles.content: The Sims 4 will release its new expansion pack, Eco Lifestyle (sometimes referred to as Eco Living) on 5 June 2020. The pack will bring new features to the much-loved simulation franchise, including pollution that impacts all worlds and the Sims themselves. … [+1059 chars]
